message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you, let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet at $11,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, $11,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,200, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
